page.title: 17Hotels Cont.
page.content: We met the Director of the Hotel in the Banqueting Suite & he told us about the Hotel.There are 21 bedrooms, all with TV & Kettle.The prise of a room & breakfast is about Â£17 per person & all rooms have toilets.There are 4 bars.The Hotel caters for parties.Beer is 74p a pint & 58p for shorts.The Hotel employs about 40 people & there are 3 chefs.Many famous people have stayed at the Hotel such as Harold Wilson,Margaret Thatcher, Barry John & Dennis Law.There are no facilities for sport or disabled people.About 7000 people stay at the Hotel every year.Breakfast time is from 8:30am to 9:30am.There is a cheaper rate for children's breakfast.
